name: Malaika
description:
Malaika returns to our MSX computers! And this time she is facing her very first challenge on a different game genre. Enjoy this 16KB platform game full of joy, catchy musics, tons of color and action, in the shape of 80s classics such as Bubble Bobble!

STORY

Suddenly the peaceful Prehistoric World became attacked! Some strange creatures from outer space were invading every single corner in the planet. What could they do?

Malaika, the young princess of the Prehistoric World decided it was enough! There were aliens everywhere: in the fields, in the woods… also, big spaceships were floating everywhere with nasty sounds and filling the air with pollution.

Said and done! Malaika steps ahead in front of danger, and starts her solo fight against the invasor. Would you help her to succeed?
